Strings.Text: {scroll 2}A mercenary's corpse. He \nmight have died fighting.

{scroll 2}It seems to be an old 
music box.{clear 0}{scroll 2}There is something written
on the lid.{clear 0}
‟u d u u d u”

{scroll 2}An old music box. Its 
melody is out of order.{clear 0}{scroll 2}There is something written
on the lid.{clear 0}
‟d u d d u d”
